name: PHP (Symfony) developer for US Company
description:
Axiom excels in providing outstaffing and recruitment services, from hiring to controlling workflow: IT, Back Office, Support, and Market Research. Nowadays Axiom has successfully built effective remote command channels and carried out complex IT projects.

The company is currently working on creating a SAAS application – Employee life cycle management. The platform is designed to automate and simplify the process of selection, recruiting and onboarding of candidates in various areas, employee management (including offers, contracts, calendar, time monitoring etc.), task management, payroll and more. The right person will be responsible for the Time Tracker development for the Axiom App.

Requirements:

– Strong knowledge PHP 7+

– Strong experience with Symfony 3+

– Experience with Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS

– Strong knowledge of design principles, user interfaces, Web standards and usability

– Strong communication skills and ability to work closely with our development, creative and project management teams

Working Conditions:

– Project-based job (approximately 2-3 month) with the possibility of extending the contract

– Working schedule: flexible hours Monday to Friday (but you need to be available till 12 PM EST for communication purposes)

– Monthly payments on Payoneer/PayPal/cryptocurrency wallet;

– Holidays and days off can be discussed;

– English-speaking environment.

After the first step of the interview process you need to complete a task in order to check your PHP knowledge and English language proficiency.

NOTE. It is a fully remote position, based on contract employment.
